name: Unschool: Get IGNOU, NIOS D.El.Ed, DU SOL Notes
description: Unschool is a free app where people share and save notes. Unschool free notes sharing app lets you:  1- Discuss with students in Feed Section 2- Upload Important Notes in Saved Notes Section 3- Upload PDF and images to share with others in FeedSection  4- Download notes from other students  Unschool currently supports following distance learning programs:  Indira Gandhi National Open University (IGNOU) NIOS Diploma in Elementary Education (NIOS D.El.Ed.)  School of Open Learning Delhi University (DU SOL)   Indira Gandhi National Open University (IGNOU): Get IGNOU assignments, IGNOU notes, IGNOU Results and much more. Get IGNOU guess papers and prepare for exams.  NIOS Diploma in Elementary Education (NIOS D.El.Ed.): Get NIOS D.El.Ed School Based Activities (SBA), Workshop Based Activities (WBA) and lesson plans  School of Open Learning Delhi University (DU SOL): Find complete DU SOL material here like notes and previous year question papers   Get updates on Distance Learning: http://www.getunschool.com/  Ask queries or connect with us: https://www.facebook.com/getunschool/
